fullText: Next Fall is a play that wants to have it both ways: to be both a comedy about the clash between faith and sexuality and a tearjerker about love and loss.
dtliExcerpt: Next Fall is a play that wants to have it both ways: to be both a comedy about the clash between faith and sexuality and a tearjerker about love and loss.
